column5: i’m so sorry she did that, that’s so messed up. but i’m in the same boat here! my mum keeps telling me i need to lose weight to help me get him back..... thanks mum

i had the same thing happen a couple weeks ago, and everyday i’m crying less and less! time truly does help, but remember that it’s perfectly valid and normal to feel upset and want to cry! good on you for being so strong, wishing you all the best xx
